    • Method Detail

      • viewCourses

        java.util.List<Course> viewCourses()
        Method for getting the list of all courses available for the professor to choose
        Returns:
        returns a list of all the courses where professorId is null

      • viewSelectedCourses

        java.util.List<Course> viewSelectedCourses(java.lang.String professorId)
        Method for getting the list of all courses selected by the professor
        Parameters:
        professorId - unique Id to represent a professor
        Returns:
        returns a list of all the courses where professorId matches the professorId provided

      • indicateCourse

        void indicateCourse(java.lang.String professorId,
                    java.lang.String courseId)
             throws CourseNotFoundException,
                    CourseNotAvailableException,
                    CourseAlreadyIndicatedException
        Method for the professor to indicate their courses
        Parameters:
        professorId - unique Id to represent a professor
        courseId - unique Id to represent a course
        Throws:
        CourseNotFoundException - if course with courseId not present in the system
        CourseNotAvailableException - if course with courseId already alloted to some professor
        CourseAlreadyIndicatedException - if course with courseId already alloted to professorId

      • validateCourse

        boolean validateCourse(java.lang.String courseId,
                       java.lang.String professorId)
        Method to check whether the course is taught by the professor or not
        Parameters:
        courseId - unique Id to represent a course
        professorId - unique Id to represent a professor
        Returns:
        returns true if the course is taught by the professor otherwise false

      • viewEnrolledStudents

        java.util.List<Student> viewEnrolledStudents(java.lang.String courseId)
        Method to view all the students enrolled in the course
        Parameters:
        courseId - unique Id to represent a course
        Returns:
        returns a list of all the students enrolled in the course

      • viewUngradedStudents

        java.util.List<Student> viewUngradedStudents(java.lang.String courseId)
        Method for retrieving the ungraded students enrolled in a course using SQL commands
        Parameters:
        courseId - unique Id to represent a course
        Returns:
        returns a list of strings indicating the ungraded students enrolled in a course from the database

      • gradeStudent

        java.lang.String gradeStudent(java.lang.String studentId,
                              java.lang.String courseId,
                              float grade,
                              java.lang.String semester)
        Method for the professor to grade a student for a particular course
        Parameters:
        studentId - unique Id to represent a student
        courseId - unique Id to represent a course
        grade - floating point number that represents the grade provided for the course
        semester - indicates the semester
        Returns:
        returns a string indicating the student was graded successfully
